description: Adobe Illustrator in Under 10 is the ultimate in go to referential source material. Tons of times students and experts find themselves so accustomed to a certain process or toolset that when it comes time for them to venture out of their comfort zone, they no longer remember or have never studied the functionality of other tools within the program. This course solves those issues by providing a central hub of general and specific knowledge on how to utilize the most popular and often overlooked tools in Adobe Illustrator. Taking this course will provide you withÂ key knowledge without the hassle of long drawn out tutorials, as well as a great deal of outside resource information for the avid student!
title: Adobe Illustrator in Under 10: Fast info at your Fingertips!
